import React from 'react';
import styled from 'styled-components'
import { Grid, Row, Col } from 'react-styled-flexboxgrid'

const Box = styled.div`
	background-color: white;
	height: 3rem;
	border: 0.25rem solid red;
`

const BigBox = styled(Box)`
	height: 7.5rem; 
`

const theme = {
  flexboxgrid: {
    // Defaults
    gridSize: 12, // columns
    gutterWidth: 1, // rem
    outerMargin: 2, // rem
    mediaQuery: 'only screen',
    container: {
      sm: 46, // rem
      md: 61, // rem
      lg: 76  // rem
    },
    breakpoints: {
      xs: 0,  // em
      sm: 48, // em
      md: 64, // em
      lg: 75  // em
    }
  }
}

const App = () => {
  return (
	  <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
		  <Grid fluid>
			  <Row>
				  <Col xs={2}>
					  <Box></Box>
				  </Col>
				  <Col xs={8}>
					  <Box></Box>
				  </Col>
				  <Col xs={2}>
					  <Box></Box>
				  </Col>
			  </Row>
			  <Row>
				  <Col xs={4} sm={3} md={2}>
					  <Box></Box>
				  </Col>
				  <Col xs={4} sm={6} md={8}>
					  <Box></Box>
				  </Col>
				  <Col xs={4} sm={3} md={2}>
					  <Box></Box>
				  </Col>
			  </Row>
			  <Row>
				  <Col xs={4} sm={3} md={2}>
					  <Row>
						  <Col xs>
							  <Box></Box>
						  </Col>
					  </Row>
					  <Row>
						  <Col xs>
							  <Box></Box>
						  </Col>
					  </Row>
				  </Col>
				  <Col xs={4} sm={6} md={8}>
					  <BigBox></BigBox>
				  </Col>
				  <Col xs={4} sm={3} md={2}>
					  <BigBox></BigBox>
				  </Col>
			  </Row>
		  </Grid>
	  </ThemeProvider>
  );
}

export default App;
